name: MotorStorm: Arctic Edge
description:
MotorStorm: Arctic Edge is a racing-arcade game developed by Virtuos and Bigbig Studios. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment. MotorStorm: Arctic Edge has a Metascore of 79, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play MotorStorm: Arctic Edge on PSP and PlayStation 2.
